metadata.description: The name for the dashboard resource.
The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The AppInsights Resource ID of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

content.json:
## New workbook
---

Welcome to your new workbook.  This area will display text formatted as markdown.


We've included a basic analytics query to get you started. Use the `Edit` button below each section to configure it or add more sections.
## Total Queries - Sum all events with the name "onSearch"

content.query:
customEvents 
| summarize total_queries = sumif(itemCount, name has "onSearch")

content.json: ## Total Sessions - Count unique sessions for event "onSearch"

content.query:
customEvents 
| summarize total_sessions = dcountif(session_Id, name has "onSearch")

content.json: ## Successful Session Rate - (all sessions ending with success / all sessions with search event) * 100

content.query:
customEvents 
| summarize total_success = dcountif(session_Id, customDimensions.event == 'onSuccess') , total_sessions = dcountif(session_Id, name has "onSearch")
| project todouble(total_success)/todouble(total_sessions)

content.json: ## Total Users - Number of unique users logging into the system
## Mean Reciprocal Rank - All time Mean Reciprocal Rank  - average of rank of first successful result

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value: {"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"customEvents \n| summarize total_sessions = dcountif(tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), name == \"onSearch\")","size":3,"color":"blue","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.insights/components","visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"total_sessions","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"max":10,"palette":"blue"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal"}},"tooltipFormat":{"tooltip":"Total Number of User Sessions"}},"showBorder":false,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value: {"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"customEvents \n| summarize total_success = dcountif(tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), name == 'onSuccess') , total_sessions = dcountif(tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), name == \"onSearch\")\n| project todouble(total_success)/todouble(total_sessions)","size":3,"color":"blue","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.insights/components","visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"Column1","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"max":1,"palette":"redGreen"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"percent"}},"tooltipFormat":{"tooltip":"Successful Sessions / Total Sessions"}},"showBorder":false,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let ranks = customEvents
| where  name == 'onNavigate' 
| where timestamp > todatetime('2022-08-16T10:47:28.221Z')
| extend queryId=tostring(customDimensions.query), documentId=tostring(customDimensions.documentId), rankPosition=toint(customDimensions.indexRank), session_Id = tostring(customDimensions.sessionId)
| distinct session_Id , queryId, documentId, rankPosition;
customEvents
| where   name == 'onSuccess' 
| extend queryId = tostring(customDimensions.query), documentId=tostring(customDimensions.documentId), rankPosition=toint(customDimensions.indexRank)
| project queryId, documentId, mock_timestamp = todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp)
| join kind=inner ranks on queryId and documentId
| summarize ReciprocalRank  =  arg_max(1.0 / (rankPosition), 1.0 / (rankPosition), *) 
by session_Id, queryId, format_datetime(mock_timestamp,'yy-MM-dd')
|summarize iif(isnan(avg(ReciprocalRank)),0.0, avg(ReciprocalRank))","size":3,"color":"blue","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.insights/components","visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"Column1","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"max":0.8,"palette":"redGreen"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"percent"},"emptyValCustomText":"0"},"tooltipFormat":{"tooltip":"Mean Reciprocal Rank"}},"showBorder":false,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| where customDimensions.query == "They is playing a game"
| where customDimensions.session == "288044"
| summarize arg_max(1.0/customDimensions.position, 1.0/customDimensions.position, *) by tostring(customDimensions.session), tostring(customDimensions.query)

content.Query:
customEvents 
| where customDimensions.event == 'onSuccess'  
| project correlationId = tostring(customDimensions.correlationId), documentId=tostring(customDimensions.documentId), rankPosition=toint(customDimensions.indexRank), sessionId = tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), Date = bin(todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp), 1d) 
| summarize ReciprocalRank =  arg_max(1.0 / rankPosition, *) by sessionId, correlationId, Date 
| where isnotnull(ReciprocalRank) 
| make-series ["Daily Mean RR"] = avg(ReciprocalRank) default=0 on Date step 1d 
| render timechart with (ymin=0, ymax=1)

partHeader.title: Daily Reciprocal Rank
partHeader.subtitle: Mean RR across all daily queries

content.Query:
customEvents 
| make-series ["Total Sessions"] = dcountif(tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), name == "onSearch") default=0 on Date = todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp) step 1d 
| render timechart

let opened = customEvents 
| where customDimensions.event == 'onNavigate' 
| summarize opened_documents = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.documentId)) by Date = bin(todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp), 1d), sessionId = tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), correlationId = tostring(customDimensions.correlationId); 
 customEvents 
| where customDimensions.event == 'onSuccess' 
| summarize successful_documents = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.documentId)) by Date = bin(todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp), 1d), sessionId = tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), correlationId = tostring(customDimensions.correlationId)
| join kind=rightouter opened on Date, sessionId, correlationId
| extend num_successful_documents = iff(isnull(successful_documents), 0, successful_documents) 
| extend successful_over_open = todouble(num_successful_documents) / todouble(opened_documents)
| make-series ["Successful documents over opened documents Rate"] = avg(successful_over_open) * 100 default=0 on Date step 1d 
| render timechart with (ymin=0, ymax=100)

yAxis.name: Successful documents over inspected documents Rate

partHeader.title: Successful over Inspected Rate
partHeader.subtitle: Documents with success feedback / inspected documents

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents 
| where name == 'onSearch'
| project timestamp, customDimensions.query

content.Query:
customEvents 
| where name == 'onSearch'
| summarize Timestamp = min(todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp)) by Query = tostring(customDimensions.query), correlation_id = tostring(customDimensions.correlationId)
| project  Timestamp, Query, correlation_id
| sort by Timestamp desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents 
| where name == 'onSearch'
| summarize ["Query Count"] = sum(itemCount) by Query = tostring(customDimensions.query)
| order by ["Query Count"] desc

content.Query:
customEvents 
| where name == 'onSearch'
| summarize ["Query Count"] = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.correlationId)) by Query = tostring(customDimensions.query)
| order by ["Query Count"] desc

settings.content: ▼ Bottom 20 Queries with Lowest Reciprocal Rank
▲ Top 20 Queries with Highest Reciprocal Rank

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| where customDimensions.event == 'onSuccess' 
| summarize ReciprocalRank =  arg_max(1.0 / (customDimensions.index_rank + 1), 1.0 / (customDimensions.index_rank + 1), *) 
    by
    tostring(customDimensions.sessionId),
    tostring(customDimensions.correlationId),
    tostring(customDimensions.query),
    format_datetime(timestamp, 'yy-MM-dd')
// | sort by ReciprocalRank asc
|project timestamp, customDimensions_sessionId, customDimensions_correlationId, customDimensions.query, ReciprocalRank
| top 10 by ReciprocalRank asc

content.Query:
customEvents 
| where customDimensions.event == 'onSuccess'  
| extend correlationId = tostring(customDimensions.correlationId), documentId=tostring(customDimensions.documentId), rankPosition=toint(customDimensions.indexRank), sessionId = tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), Date = bin(todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp), 1d) 
| summarize ReciprocalRank =  arg_max(1.0 / rankPosition, *) by sessionId, correlationId, Date 
| where isnotnull(ReciprocalRank)
| project Timestamp = todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp), ReciprocalRank, Query = tostring(customDimensions.query)
| top 20 by ReciprocalRank asc
| sort by ReciprocalRank asc, Timestamp desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| where customDimensions.event == 'onSuccess' 
| summarize ReciprocalRank =  arg_max(1.0 / (customDimensions.index_rank + 1), 1.0 / (customDimensions.index_rank + 1), *) 
    by
    tostring(customDimensions.sessionId),
    tostring(customDimensions.correlationId),
    tostring(customDimensions.query),
    format_datetime(timestamp, 'yy-MM-dd')
// | sort by ReciprocalRank asc
|project timestamp, customDimensions_sessionId, customDimensions_correlationId, customDimensions.query, ReciprocalRank
| top 10 by ReciprocalRank desc

content.Query:
customEvents 
| where customDimensions.event == 'onSuccess'  
| extend correlationId = tostring(customDimensions.correlationId), documentId=tostring(customDimensions.documentId), rankPosition=toint(customDimensions.indexRank), sessionId = tostring(customDimensions.sessionId), Date = bin(todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp), 1d) 
| summarize ReciprocalRank =  arg_max(1.0 / rankPosition, *) by sessionId, correlationId, Date 
| where isnotnull(ReciprocalRank)
| project Timestamp = todatetime(customDimensions.mock_timestamp), ReciprocalRank, Query = tostring(customDimensions.query)
| top 20 by ReciprocalRank desc
| sort by ReciprocalRank desc, Timestamp desc
